items.summary: Create a Zustand-based global state management system with four stores persisted to localStorage: (1) userStore with fields: name, email, gender, ageRange, skinType, skinConcerns, routinePreference, glowPoints, streak, bestStreak, tier, totalRoutinesCompleted, hasCompletedOnboarding; (2) routineStore with todayMorningSteps, todayEveningSteps, history, currentStreak, bestStreak, and actions completeMorningStep(id), completeEveningStep(id), completeFullRoutine(type); (3) shopStore with products array, cart, wishlist, and actions addToCart, removeFromCart, toggleWishlist, checkout; (4) communityStore with posts array, leaderboard array, and likePost(id) action.

Build the ProfileScreen at `/profile` with: (1) Profile header showing gradient avatar circle with initials, name, email, member since date, and edit profile button; (2) Stats grid ‚Äî Total GlowPoints, Current Streak, Routines Completed, Products Reviewed; (3) Tier card showing current tier badge, points progress bar, and 'Next: [tier] at [X] points' label; (4) Achievements section with badge grid ‚Äî üî• First Streak (7 days), üå∏ Full Bloom (30 days), ‚≠ê First Review, üõçÔ∏è First Purchase, üëë GlowPro Tier, üíé Top Achiever ‚Äî locked badges shown grayed out; (5) My Routines Summary with morning/evening completion rates and weekly chart; (6) Wishlist grid of saved products; (7) Settings section with notification preference toggles, privacy settings, 'Data Privacy' link, and a prominent 'We never sell your data üîí' badge; (8) An accessible Privacy Policy sub-screen with full privacy policy text, data usage explanation, and GDPR/data rights section.

Implement the gamification logic: (1) GlowPoints awards ‚Äî +10 for completing morning routine, +10 for completing evening routine, +5 bonus for completing both in the same day, +50 bonus for reaching a 7-day streak, +15 for writing a review, +25 for first purchase; (2) Tier calculation ‚Äî Starter: 0‚Äì499, GlowUp: 500‚Äì1499, GlowPro: 1500+; (3) Flower state function ‚Äî streak 0 (previously active): 'withered', streak 1‚Äì2: 'seed', streak 3‚Äì6: 'bud', streak 7+: 'bloom'; (4) Floating '+10' text animation appearing near the GlowPoints badge when points are earned; (5) Streak counter with number-roll animation on increment.

Implement global UI effects: (1) Confetti animation using CSS particle animation with 20‚Äì30 particles in lavender, pink, mint green, and gold falling from top over 1.5 seconds, triggered on routine completion and achievement unlock; (2) Web Audio API chime on routine completion using the provided oscillator code (880Hz sine wave, 0.8s decay); (3) In-app toast notification system with slide-in-from-top animation, displaying messages: 'üå∏ Time for your morning routine!', 'üî• Don't break your X-day streak!', 'üíß Your flower needs water ‚Äî log today's routine', '‚ú® New personalized products just for you', 'üèÜ You're close to GlowPro tier!'.

Implement all page and UI animations: (1) Page transitions ‚Äî fade + slide-up between routes; (2) Onboarding step transitions ‚Äî slide in/out horizontally; (3) Card hover effect ‚Äî slight scale-up with elevated shadow; (4) Tab switch transition ‚Äî smooth fade; (5) Cart badge bounce animation when item is added; (6) Completion checkmark draw animation on routine step completion; (7) Flower state morphing ‚Äî smooth transition when state changes.

Apply the full Luminique design system consistently across all screens: (1) Background gradient: beige #F5E6D6 to lavender #E8DFF5; (2) Primary purple #7B4BB7, deep violet #5B2D91, soft lavender #BCA6E6, mint green #7ED1B2, light peach #EBCBB3; (3) Text dark #111111, text muted #6B6B8A; (4) Glass morphism cards with rgba(255,255,255,0.75) background and backdrop-blur; (5) Poppins font (weights 300‚Äì700) loaded from Google Fonts; (6) Max-width 430px mobile container centered on desktop with a subtle phone frame/shadow; (7) Bottom safe area padding for the tab bar; (8) Minimum 44px touch targets for all interactive elements; (9) No horizontal scroll on any screen.

Create an inline SVG lotus logo component (Logo component) with: a rounded square container using a warm beige gradient (#F2D8C2 ‚Üí #EBCBB3); a symmetrical 5-petal lotus flower using a deep violet (#5B2D91) to lavender (#BCA6E6) gradient; a central circular core with lavender highlight; two mint green (#7ED1B2) leaves beneath the flower; and a 'luminique' wordmark in Poppins medium weight, dark charcoal #111111.

Implement the personalization recommendations engine: a getRecommendations(user) utility that filters products by matching the user's skinType and/or skinConcerns, sorts by descending rating, and returns the top 6 results. Display the results in the Shop's 'Personalized for you' section with the label '‚ú® Based on your [skinType] skin & [concern] concerns'.

Implement React Router navigation with the following routes: `/` (SplashScreen), `/onboarding` (OnboardingScreen), `/home` (HomeScreen), `/routine` (RoutineScreen), `/shop` (ShopScreen), `/community` (CommunityScreen), `/profile` (ProfileScreen). New users (no localStorage profile) are sent to `/onboarding` after splash; returning users go directly to `/home`.

Build a SplashScreen at `/` with: an animated Luminique lotus SVG logo (scale + fade-in animation), the tagline 'Glow. Grow. Bloom.', an animated beige-to-lavender gradient background, and auto-redirect logic after 2.5 seconds.

Build a multi-step OnboardingScreen at `/onboarding` with 8 steps and a progress indicator. Steps: (1) Welcome with logo and 'Get Started' CTA; (2) Gender selection cards ‚Äî Male/Female/Others; (3) Age range cards ‚Äî 13‚Äì19, 20‚Äì29, 30‚Äì39, 40‚Äì49, 50+; (4) Skin type cards with icons ‚Äî Normal, Oily, Dry, Combination, Sensitive with short descriptions; (5) Multi-select skin concern pills ‚Äî Acne, Pigmentation, Dullness, Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Uneven Texture, Redness, Large Pores; (6) Routine preference cards ‚Äî üåÖ Morning, üåô Evening, ‚ú® Both; (7) Mock AI skin scan with camera frame UI, 'Analyzing your skin...' progress animation, mock result text ('Your skin appears Combination with mild Pigmentation'), and skip option; (8) Profile creation with name input, email input, 'Continue with Email' button, mock 'Continue with Google' button, and privacy note 'We never sell your data üîí'. Each step slides in/out with animation. All collected data is saved to userStore and localStorage.

Keep glowing!'), Withered (missed, ü•Ä, 'Your flower needs care...') ‚Äî with smooth CSS transitions and a pulsing glow animation on Bloom; (3) A streak counter showing the streak number with fire emoji, 'Day streak' label, and a 7-day calendar strip with filled/empty circles; (4) Quick action cards for 'Complete Morning Routine' and 'Complete Evening Routine' with one-tap completion, checkmark + confetti animation, and Web Audio API chime; (5) A Today's Tip card with rotating skincare tips based on user's skin type; (6) A GlowPoints Summary card showing current points, tier badge, and progress bar to next tier.

Create the FlowerEngine component with four animated SVG/CSS states: Seed (rounded mound, earth-brown tones), Bud (stem with small closed bud, soft green, gentle-sway CSS keyframe animation rotating -2deg to 2deg), Bloom (full lotus flower in brand purples/lavenders, pulse-glow keyframe animation scaling 1‚Üí1.05‚Üí1 with glow shadow), and Withered (drooping flower, desaturated, droop animation with translateY + opacity reduction).
